description: I am a frontend developer with experience in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and other modern technologies.
about_me_intro: Hello! My name is Ilgiz, and I am a frontend developer with two years of experience in web development. I specialize in creating user-friendly and beautiful interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. In my work, I actively use React and TypeScript, as well as Tailwind CSS for fast and efficient development.
about_me_backend: On the backend, I work with Node.js and Express, creating REST APIs to support frontend applications. This approach allows me to understand and manage the entire project system, ensuring its stable and reliable operation.
about_me_design: Besides coding, I have been engaged in design and 3D modeling for four years. I use tools such as Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and Blender 3D. These skills allow me to create interfaces that are not only functional but also visually appealing.
about_me_conclusion: I enjoy combining technical knowledge with design to create projects that are both user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing. I am always open to new ideas and believe that good communication is the foundation of a successful project. I constantly learn and seek ways to improve my skills.
